notification: Starting or pausing one of the timers automatically applies the same action to all previously activated timers, since cooldown timing in Dota 2 is synchronized across all abilities and items.
politics_1: Privacy Policy for the SpellTimer app
politics_3: Your trust is important to us. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.
politics_6: We only store data that you enter manually, such as: assigned hotkeys, interface and timer preferences. This data is stored only in your browser via localStorage. We do not send it to any servers.
politics_8: We use Yandex Metrica to collect anonymous usage statistics. This includes: number of visits and sessions, user geography (country/city, based on IP address), device and browser type, visited pages, and technical errors (if any). All of this data does not allow us to identify you personally.
politics_10: If you choose to support the project with a donation, you will be redirected to third-party payment platforms (such as DonationAlerts, etc.). We do not process or store your payment data â€” all transactions are handled through the secure systems of the payment services themselves.
politics_12: The app uses only one third-party service: Yandex Metrica â€” for collecting anonymized analytics.
politics_14: We do not store or transmit personal data. All user settings remain only in your browser. Analytics is completely anonymous and used solely to improve the application's performance.
politics_16: If you have any questions or suggestions, you can contact us via email: spelltimer@gmail.com
politics_18: We may periodically make changes to this policy. The current version will always be available via the link in the app.
